column5: well guys, think i'm gonna end up going to nipissing..... i have stayed at a few different resorts but have not stayed at this one.....  wanted to get some info on it and here some thoughts from those of you that have been....  thanks a lot guys!!!!  ps- i usually fish the south river area.... this year i wanted to try this place whicih is located near cache bay, or  try out callander bay....  all info is greatly appreciated!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Hmm...dont know if I'd stay anywhere with the name plague in it....LOL...  Oh wait...it's La Plage...sorry....
hahaha it's ok..... hoping i get some gooooooood info

I haven't been there in a few (8) years but good perching through the weed crossing to the left of the camp.  It's in the shallow end of the lake so be careful.  Cabin 17 is the best away from everyone and it has it's own dock.
oh really.... i didn't really want to be in the shallow part of the lake!!!   thanks a lot for the info!!!
